document.full_text: global food prices measured by the u.n.'s food agency may have come off record highs in march after falls in grain prices, but supply concerns and soaring oil prices mean such a move could just be a pause before new peaks.
document.title: fao food index to hover near record high in march
lines_and_colors: global food prices measured by the u.n.'s food agency may have come off record highs in march after falls in grain prices, but supply concerns and soaring oil prices mean such a move could just be a pause before new peaks.
